text: KFTY-LD, virtual channel 45 (VHF digital channel 2), is a low-powered television station licensed to Sacramento, California, United States. The station is owned by HC2 Holdings. ==History== The station’s construction permit was issued on February 25, 2010 under the calls of K02QO-D. It moved to its current callsign KFTY-LD on November 12, 2013.http://www.fccinfo.com/CMDProEngine.php?sCurrentService=TV&tabSearchType;=Appl&sAppIDNumber;=182644 ==Digital channels== The station's digital signal is multiplexed: {| class="wikitable" |- !
